title: Hero MotoCorp reports 5 pc dip in sales in April
description: Domestic sales declined to 3,86,184 units from 3,98,490 units in April 2022. Exports also dipped to 9,923 units last month from 20,132 units in the year-ago period.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
